评论详情: Upon first sight, I loved the style of this dress. I ordered a size small (I am 5’4” and 135lb). Unfortunately, this dress ran very large and was rather wide. It did not look flattering on; therefore, I decided to return it.
Looks really classy and high quality in person! Bought for a funeral and it could be great for a work event too.

I purchased this dress for my adult daughter to wear to a funeral. It arrived in two days, it fits perfectly, looks good and can be worn for less somber occasions. It hits her at the knee, but she is 5'ft even and it might be very short on a taller girl.

I am 5' 4", hits just right above the knee.  The fabric is a heavier knit material, buttons look nice not cheap! I ordered an XL, I could have worn a L but I do not like tight clothing.  I have room in the skirt portion, the sleeves are a bit long, but sleeves normally are for me. I will wear this to work that I have to dress professional.

I put this dress on out of the package and it fit perfectly: arms, length, and most importantly the waist fell at my waist. You never know when buying online how the fit will be. I’m 5’3” and 135, I ordered the M. The length hit just above my knee. I also purchased the same dress in the green color and it fits the same. Both wash well, I hung to dry because of the buttons. The dress is tight-knit sweater so it hangs well and is warm.
I loved the fit, style, warmth and comfort of this dress.

评论概述: Best for Curvy Petites or Short Torso Shapes
评论详情: This dress arrived and it looked just as shown here in the pictures and I expected to be very pleased.  Sadly this just didn't work for me as the dress is much shorter on me than I expected.  I am 5'7 with a longer torso and when I put this on it comes off as almost a minidress, which doesn't match the look of the dress or style of clothing that I would wear at my age.  I would recommend this for petite women, but not for taller women.  The skirt portion of the dress is also slimmer and les structured than the top portion of the dress, so if you are top heavy or slimmer through the hips, this won't look balanced.  This is a dress that will be more flattering for curvy pear shapes and less flattering on apple or triangle shapes.I ordered this dress in a size XL and it is roomy all over.  I typically wear a size 12 and I could see this size fitting a size 14/16 pear shaped petite very well.

Originally I wanted to return this as the long sleeves and heavy material was making me too hot. However, the second it got below 50F I was wearing this comfortably and it was perfect. Great for parties, events, functions. One of my fave!
Cute little sweater dress. Just right for work or casual wear. Light weight material. Not thin but not heavy either.
Fit was true to size and i was impressed it was actually decent quality.
Quality of the dress is good, especially considering cost, but this dress runs large. I ordered a medium and it was much too big. Had to return it.

The NEIWONA Fall/Winter Long Sleeve Dress is both stylish and comfortable. The button details and flattering fit make it a great choice for formal events or casual outings. The soft fabric keeps you warm, while the design exudes elegance. Highly recommend for seasonal wardrobe upgrades.

It’s a smart looking dress but it’s larger than usual sizing, being especially bulky in the shoulders and bust. I’m large busted (38D) and the XL was huge on me— the top was swimming on me. The color is great and the fabric and buttons are high quality. It’s very comfortable but the sleeves are too long and I have to were them pushed up. Overall, the top is disproportionately to big.
Beautiful though buttons need securing
Very good thick fabric . Looks like a very nice dress and for the price it’s a steal. Very nice fit, very comfortable

This is a very classy and chic dress. The fabric is thick and feels/looks high-quality.  I would definitely recommend line-drying this (I even hand-washed it because I was afraid of ruining it).  The one thing that's a drawback is that it falls on the body differently than in the listing photo. In the photo it looks almost rigid and falls straight like a shift dress. In reality, it's quite wide in the hips but narrower than expected in the bust/stomach so it almost looks like it SHOULD be tailored/form-fitted and yet isn't quite there.  I happen to have a very straight figure but with a tummy pooch and I 100% needed shapewear with this, which I did not expect to be an issue when I ordered it.  I am not delusional enough to expect clothes to look on me like they look on the model, but thought it was worth pointing out in case this is helpful for others.

Nice dress. Super chick. It’s stretchy. It’s made of thicker material making it perfect for fall/winter. It hit a few inches above the knee for me. For reference I’m wearing the size small and I’m 5”2 and 115lbs in the photo.

My NENONA Crew Neck Bodycon Sweater Dress is the epitome of graceful elegance! It is giving high end luxury! This is a very Chanel inspired dress! The gold buttons are so elegant! I got this dress in the color Khaki and the size XL! This is a long sleeve dress that exudes sophistication! I definitely will be back to order additional colors! I love it! The fit and style of this dress are pure perfection!

Soft, comfortable, cute, modest, classy, and professional! The shiny gold buttons make it look like a Lilly Pulitzer piece. The navy is gorgeous and rich, not dull at all. You could wear this to work, to an interview, to a conference, to a family event, or anywhere you need to look like the PERFECT LITERAL combination of demure, mindful, and cutesy (LOL).  It fits true to size and according to the size chart. I washed it in a delicates bag on cold wash and then line-dried it, and it came out perfect. No shrinkage, no pilling. One of my favorite things I've gotten from Vine lately. Can't wait to wear it this fall!
This sweater dress is adorable. Great for work or going out. Fits great and feels great on. True to size. Nice addition to my wardrobe.

I am 5’ and 117 lbs.  I ordered a medium and it fits perfectly. I love the material. It’s warm for Fall and Winter. I love it so much and it feels so comfortable that I first ordered it in navy Blue and then in beige. You can’t go wrong with this purchase.
